meanings.definition: characterized by steady, earnest, and energetic effort
meanings.sent1: She is a diligent student, always working hard on her assignments.
meanings.sent2: The diligent worker never missed a deadline.
meanings.sent3: The diligent squirrel stored nuts for the winter with great determination.
meanings.sent4: The diligent bee buzzed from flower to flower, collecting nectar for the hive.
meanings.sent5: Her diligent practice paid off when she won the competition.

meanings.definition: showing care and conscientiousness in one's work or duties
meanings.sent1: He is a diligent employee, always making sure his work is top-notch.
meanings.sent2: The diligent nurse took great care of the patients in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The diligent chef meticulously prepared each dish with precision.
meanings.sent4: The diligent gardener tended to each plant as if it were a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: Her diligent attention to detail ensured the project's success.

meanings.definition: done with careful and persistent effort
meanings.sent1: The diligent detective solved the case after weeks of investigation.
meanings.sent2: She was diligent in her pursuit of learning new skills.
meanings.sent3: The diligent artist spent hours perfecting every stroke of the painting.
meanings.sent4: The diligent student revised her notes multiple times before the exam.
meanings.sent5: His diligent work ethic set him apart from his peers.
